name: The World's Hardest Game (Godot Remaster WIP)
name_original: The World's Hardest Game (Godot Remaster WIP)
description:
My first project,

Still a very early prototype, only 1 level at the moment but i'm still updating the game as you read this.

Have fun!

Also, this game is heavily inspired by old flash game "World's Hardest Game" by Snubby land.
